articles.title: Coronavirus outbreak: India records 4213 fresh cases with 97 deaths within 24 hours - Mirror Now
articles.description: India records 4213 fresh COVID-19 cases with 97 deaths within 24 hours, making this a highest single-day spike till date. The total cases now stand at 67,152...
articles.content:
India records 4213 fresh COVID-19 cases with 97 deaths within 24 hours, making this a highest single-day spike till date. The total cases now stand at 67,152 with over 2000 deaths. Tune in for more updates!

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: ICMR issues guidance for appropriate recording of COVID-19 deaths to create robust data - The Hindu
articles.description: In its guidance for appropriate recording of COVID-10 deaths in India, the ICMR said deaths with inconclusive test results, but in which coronavirus symptoms are present will be recorded as “probable COVID-19” fatalities
articles.content:
COVID-19 would be recorded as an underlying cause of death when leading to pneumonia, cardiac injury and clotting in the bloodstream, among others, according to the guidance issued by ICMR for appropriate recording of deaths due to the disease in India.
